title: club is gone
body:
club name: Shkin Brothers
club tag: Shkin

all my friends can see it except me and i am the owner

replies.body: There's been some[ issues with clubs ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016)after it was restored over the weekend.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help you out individually as well as report it to our clubs team.  We'll respond as soon as possible!

I have exactly the same Problem I was leader of the ABUTZ Club and I have not played the game for quite a Long time. all my friends still have the Club tag and they still can see me but i cant see the Club or the Club tag anymore . im on EUW
